content: In this cloud step-like form, you'll only be able to see their purple eye flash before they lunge at you and deal incredible damage -- even causing purple explosions or icy blasts around their slash -- so be ready with a deflect or cloud step of your own.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Brook of Bliss'.
The content is as follows:
In this cloud step-like form, you'll only be able to see their purple eye flash before they lunge at you and deal incredible damage -- even causing purple explosions or icy blasts around their slash -- so be ready with a deflect or cloud step of your own.
